title: Finance VA - Quickbooks
job_overview:
We are looking for a full-time virtual assistant in finance or assisting in the finance department to handle the company's accounting and financial activity. You need to be able to work independently and be proactive in asking for help when you need it. In this role, you will play an important role in keeping the company books updated and accurate. You need to have good organizational skills and work ethic.

The day-to-day activity includes but is not limited to:
- Entering bank transactions
- Entering credit card transactions
- Entering and Paying Bills
- Collecting Payment for Open Invoices
- Reconciling Bills and Payables
- Reconciling Bank Statements
- Reconciling Credit Card Statements
- Running Custom Reports as Requested
- Administrative tasks
- Perform other duties as assigned

Ideal candidate:
- Excellent English writing and communication skills.
- A desire to work in a fast-paced environment; we greatly value those who can communicate effectively with our amazing team and return work promptly.
Strong organizational skills and planning skills.
- Extreme attention to detail.
- Experience in QuickBooks Desktop or bookkeeping skills is a must.
- Willing to undergo a background check.

Compensation + Perks:
- Salary based on experience and expertise
- Long-term employment focus with opportunities for mutual growth
- Monthly benefits package starting after 6 months: Premium healthcare plan, Paid holidays and vacation days, Additional incentives
- Annual performance reviews for potential salary increases
- Monthly virtual team-building events with fun activities, games, and rewards
